name: Witch Trip - Game Jam Beta
description:
Auto scroller survival action! Ride a seagull across the ocean and avoid hazards! Press Z to flap and gain altitude (and hold an arrow key left or right to gain momentum in those directions). When things get hectic you can always focus to slow time.

Created for the MOONMOON_OW game jam on twitch.tv!

There are 4 levels that loop, but I plan to continue work on this game to make it into a more complete experience!
